feed.title: Fix available for startup issues for git HEAD nodes

entry.title: Fix available for startup issues for git HEAD nodes
entry.summary: If there is an issue with the output of spent nodes and a corrupted database in Bitcoin, there may be a potential fix available. The solution can be found on Github, but it should be noted that it was rushed and poorly tested. It is recommended to ask a developer for more information in IRC before attempting to use it.
